_meta.description: SCATTER CHART - Show correlation between two variables
_meta.outputPath: Renders to same directory as input JSON
_meta.strategy: Use to show relationships/correlations. Add trend line to show direction.
_meta.bestFor: Correlation data, distribution analysis, comparing two metrics, outlier identification

tips.trendLine: Enable to show overall direction (positive/negative correlation)
tips.pointSize: Use varying sizes to add a third dimension (bubble chart style)
tips.color: Color code points by category for grouping

margin._desc: Extra left/bottom margin for axis titles

title._text_desc: Describe the two variables being compared

xAxis.title: Price ($)
xAxis._title_desc: Axis label describing what X represents

yAxis.title: Units Sold
yAxis._title_desc: Axis label describing what Y represents

points._radius_desc: Point size in pixels. Can override per-point
points._color_desc: Default point color. Can override per-point
points._opacity_desc: Point transparency (0-1). Lower helps see overlapping points

trendLine._desc: Linear regression line showing overall trend
trendLine._color_desc: Contrasting color so it stands out

pointLabels._show_desc: Usually off for scatter (too cluttered). Enable for few key points

animation._staggerDelay_desc: Frames between each point for sequential/random

data._desc: Each point has x (horizontal) and y (vertical) values
Outlier point - optionally highlight with different color/size
